content: pink pop cowl pattern makes a stylish and practical accessory - a perfect gift in beautiful knitters camden - 100% cashmere yarn **sizes** one size finished circumference 51 cm/ 20 inches finished length 27 cm/ 10 5 inches **yarn** 1 skein 1 x 50g/ 224 metres of beautiful knitters camden - 100% cashmere the sample is knit in colour pink pop 2 balls 2 x 25g/ 112 metres of cardiff cashmere classic 100% cashmere **needles & notions** 3 5 mm/ us 4 40 cm/ 16 inches long circular needles 4 mm/ us 6 40 cm/ 16 inches long circular needles 1 stitch marker tapestry needle **pattern notes** the cowl is knit in the round the circumference can be adjusted by adding multiple of 6 stitches
